articles.title: Convoy Meant For Nitish Kumar's Gaya Visit, Attacked On Way
articles.description: Bihar chief minister Nitish Kumar's convoy came under attack today while on way to Gaya. The Chief Minister, who is expected to visit Gaya tomorrow, was not in any of the cars, which were stopped and attacked, sources said.
articles.content:
The videos of the attack were widely circulated on the social media.

articles.title: Amit Shah Slams KCR At Mega Rally In Telangana
articles.description: Union minister Amit Shah is likely to meet Chandrababu Naidu, former Chief Minister and the chief of Telugu Desam Party, during his visit to Hyderabad today.  Local media reported that Mr Shah is likely to visit him at Ramoji Film City.

articles.title: On Camera, Man Slaps Woman Toll Booth Employee When Asked To Pay Tax
articles.description: A man slapped a woman employee of a toll both in Madhya Pradesh on Saturday after she refused to let him go without paying the tax. The man is seen angrily walking towards the employee and then slapping her across the face.
articles.content:
A case has been lodged but the accused is yet to be arrested.
